Title: Dual Frequency Comb Photonic Analog to Digital Conversion
Source: IEEE Photonics Soc. Summer Top. Meet. Ser., SUM - Proc.
Abstract: © 2020 IEEE.We demonstrate a performance improvement of dual-comb based optical analog-to-digital conversion methods. Through improved optical front-end design, we obtain 4.5 bits ENOB up to 12.5 GHz, representing 10 dB SINAD enhancement compared to previous results.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
